subject: Dear xxx,
body:
Dear xxx,
 
 We are aware that you are still in communication with people who are extorting money from you.
 
Your approval for payment of your fee have expired and you can only proceed with receiving your payment only by re-applying.
 
We shall recommend you to the Cybercrime department for investigation because your continued communication with these scammers is enabling them, you may be likely be prosecuted.
 
Best regards,
 
 Lnonart  Sonnel

subject: Re: Dear xxx,
body:
Dear Lnonart Sonnel,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about the situation I am in. Can you please provide me with more details about the payment fee that has expired? I want to make sure I understand the situation correctly before taking any further steps.

Also, you mentioned recommending me to the Cybercrime department. Could you please explain why and how they can help in this situation? I want to ensure that I am taking the right actions to protect myself.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Frances

subject: Re: Dear xxx,
body:
Hello Dear
 
Kindly do well to introduce yourself, though part of your message content show some pieces in our correspondence with scam victim  we are trying to assist ,however  the email address is not known to us.
 
If you are the client we have been communicating with before, kindly inform us and state why you have decided to communicate via a different email address.
Best regards,
 
 Lnonart  Sonnel

subject: Re: Dear xxx,
body:
Hello Lnonart Sonnel,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if my email address is not familiar to you. I am indeed a previous client of yours, but I have recently changed my email address due to some personal reasons. I hope this doesn't cause any inconvenience.

I wanted to share some information with you regarding an investment opportunity that I came across recently. It seems quite promising, and I thought it might be of interest to you as well. Have you heard about the XYZ Company? They claim to have developed a revolutionary product that has the potential to change the market.

I understand that there are many scams out there, so I did my research before considering this opportunity. The company has a solid reputation and positive reviews from reputable sources. They also have a transparent business model and provide detailed information about their product.

I would love to hear your thoughts on this opportunity. Are you open to exploring new investment options? Let me know if you would like more information or if there's anything else I can assist you with.

Best wishes,
Frances
